# Clever

## Example

```html
<amp-ad
  width="1490"
  height="250"
  type="clever"
  data-id="45366"
  data-hash="f787765d347dedcbd6314064192482bd"
>
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For additional details and support contact `suport@cleveradvertising.com`.

### Required parameters

-   `data-id`: the id of campaign
-   `data-hash`: MD5 hash of `data-id`
